Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds all the logic of the game. At different level of depth there are all the classes of the model.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model​(int numberOfDeaths,
             boolean frenzy)
        Creates the model by setting the properties sent as parameters.
        Parameters:
        numberOfDeaths - The number of death of the match.
        frenzy - If the final frenzy turn will be played.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerList

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayerList()
        Gets the playersList.
        Returns:
        The list of players.

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard​(int vote)
        Creates the board.
        Parameters:
        vote - The number of the most voted board (or the randomly chosed one).

      • getBoard

      • getEffectHandler

        public EffectHandler getEffectHandler()
        Gets the EffectHandler of the match.
        Returns:

      • addPlayer

        public Player addPlayer​(java.lang.String playerId,
                        java.lang.String character)
                 throws LoginException,
                        ColorException
        Adds a player to playerList (if possible).
        Parameters:
        playerId - The id the player chose.
        character - The Character chosen by the player.
        Returns:
        The Player Object.
        Throws:
        LoginException - If the character has already been chosen.
        ColorException - If occurs an error during the character/Color conversion.

      • searchPlayer

        public Player searchPlayer​(java.lang.String name)
                    throws ColorException
        Searches a Player based on his id.
        Parameters:
        name - The id of the player.
        Returns:
        The Player object.
        Throws:
        ColorException - If occurs an error during the character/Color conversion.

      • getActivePlayer

        public Player getActivePlayer()

      • nextPlayer

        public void nextPlayer()
        Furthers the game by setting the active player to the next one of the playersList.

      • endOfTurn

        public void endOfTurn()
               throws EndGameException
        Performs the "endOfTurn" action, checks if there are players that need to respawn.
        Throws:
        EndGameException - When the game ends.

      • toJsonObject

        public javax.json.JsonObjectBuilder toJsonObject()
        This method creates a JsonObjectBuilder containing all the information needed in the View. To the said JsonObjectBuilder will be added some JsonValues in the GameHandler.toJsonObject() method, and that will be sent to the view when needed.
        Returns:
        The JsonObect containig all the information of this card.
